heading: HB00005
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR STIFFER PENALTIES FOR PERSONS DRIVING UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL, DANGEROUS DRUGS AND SIMILAR SUBSTANCES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSES REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10586, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'ANTI-DRUNK AND DRUGGED DRIVING ACT OF 2013'
principal-authors: FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C.; ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D.; ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G.; DUAVIT, JOHN MICHAEL R.; COJUANGCO, CARLOS O.; KHO, ELISA "OLGA" T.; ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E.; SALIMBANGON, BENHUR L.; NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B.; SUAREZ, DANILO E.; BATOCABE, RODEL M.;
status: Measure approved by the Committee on 2018-02-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00005
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR STIFFER PENALTIES FOR PERSONS DRIVING UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF ALCOHOL, DANGEROUS DRUGS AND SIMILAR SUBSTANCES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSES REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10586, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'ANTI-DRUNK AND DRUGGED DRIVING ACT OF 2013'
ABSTRACT : Provides stiffer penalty to persons driving under the influence of alcohol, dangerous drugs and similar substances, amending for the purpose Republic Act No. 10586, otherwise known as the “Anti-Drunk and Drugged Driving Act of 2014.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : FARIÑAS, RODOLFO C., ALVAREZ, PANTALEON D., ANDAYA, ROLANDO JR. G., DUAVIT, JOHN MICHAEL R., COJUANGCO, CARLOS O., KHO, ELISA "OLGA" T., ABU, RANEO "RANIE" E., SALIMBANGON, BENHUR L., NOGRALES, KARLO ALEXEI B., SUAREZ, DANILO E., BATOCABE, RODEL M.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
